description: I've joined EMAKINA.PL as a Junior Salesforce Developer - I had a blast working with Salesforce as full time developer, in that time my Apex skills probably quadrupled :).

In GlaxoSmithKline I've oficially started my career in IT, it's where I've first started to work with Salesforce while supporting our Veeva CRM (Salesforce add-on) users. It's also the place where I had a chance to develop micro-automations using C#.
As a consultant in CenturyLink I didn't had much occasion to utilize or develop my technical skills in professional field, but night-shift work mode allowed me to start learning some HTML and CSS.

Capgemini brought me to their ranks as a Software Engineer, my main task are still heavily connected with Salesforce world, but I did step out of it into vanilla JavaScript, CSS and HTML when one of the projects required me to be a lead Frontend Developer in Salesforce Experience Cloud. It is also the time when I got interested in React, which this page is written in.
